short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove the annoying gesy inactivity dialog box.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clicking the extension's button the user can remove the inactivity dialog box in the GESY website. This can help avoid losing long texts that become inaccessible when the inactivity dialog is shown.
